title: Added MAGMA_HOME env var to specify alternative MAGMA root directory in FindMAGMA.cmake
body_html: FindMAGMA.cmake will look for MAGMA library under harcoded /usr/local/magma by default. This commit adds MAGMA_HOME env variable as alternative way to provide the MAGMA home directory. This is very useful (and the only way) when the user is with restricted rights and cannot install magma libraries under /usr/local/magma. Also it is helpful when having multiple versions of the library and being able to select the one to use.
